mapper.select: select exam.*, classroom.classroom_code, users.user_name, course.course_name from exam left join classroom on classroom.classroom_id = exam.classroom_id left join users on users.user_id = exam.user_id left join tc on tc.tc_id = exam.tc_id left join course on course.course_id = tc.course_id where tc.class_id IN (select users2.class_id from users users2 where users2.user_id = #{userId}) ORDER BY exam.exam_time asc
